descriptionHtml:
For many years the Solitute Bards College has been mocked and hated by the grumpy nords of Skyrim, now they get their revenge, they have put down their loots,drums and flutes to fight alongside you!! Yes the Dovahkiin,Dragonborn. Almost all of the Bards in the Bards College has decided to pick up their weapons and fight as your companions, your followers.

As Informed above this mod ads a few members of the Bards College in Solitute to your followers faction.
The following has been added:
Jorn-Bards College
Aia Arria- Bards College
Giraud Geman- Bards College
Lisette- Winking Skeever bard, also member of faction
Also two other followers from the bards college: Illi, Ataf

Please note: All Bards have been supplied with state of the art in game armour and weapons.
author: Pietpompies
